thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Allied Properties REIT Announces Normal Course Issuer Bid

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Allied Properties REIT Announces Normal Course Issuer Bid

organizations.name: reuters) - allied properties real estate investment trust

text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Allied Properties Real Estate Investment Trust:
* ALLIED PROPERTIES REIT ANNOUNCES NORMAL COURSE ISSUER BID
* ALLIED PROPERTIES REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST - ‍ALLIED INTENDS TO COMMENCE NCIB ON FEBRUARY 22, 2018​
* ALLIED PROPERTIES REIT - ‍RECEIVED APPROVAL FROM TSX FOR NCIB WHICH WILL ENABLE IT TO PURCHASE UP TO 9.1 MILLION OF ISSUED AND OUTSTANDING UNITS ​
* ALLIED PROPERTIES REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST - ‍NCIB WILL EXPIRE ON FEBRUARY 21, 2019​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
